attributes.action: not listen to America or any other international who wants war with Iran
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have our own problems and invading Afghan. and Iraq war is enough thanks to America and Uk joining America.  No more wars on other countries.  Resolve problems peacefully.  America does not like Iran so he once again is stiring up hatered against Iran so he could get his own way.  Things should be different now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
